argument.description: Is the string expression to be evaluated. string_expression can be a constant, variable, or column of either character or binary data.

returnType: bigint if expression is of the varchar(max), nvarchar(max) or varbinary(max) data types; otherwise, int.
description: Returns the number of characters of the specified string expression, excluding trailing blanks.
sample:
SELECT LEN(FirstName) AS Length, FirstName, LastName   
FROM Sales.vIndividualCustomer  
WHERE CountryRegionName = 'Australia';  
GO
